DE DIRECTIE. (23742) M^mëem vojpÈ* ïFo&ismië&jË* Do Directie van het PALEIS VOOR VOLKSVLIJT heugt bij deze, ' dat van de GELDLEENING groot /"_ ,OOO.OUO, op Heden ten 1 overstaan van den Notaris P. LOUWERSE, alhier, zijn Uitgeloot de Seriën 156?, 2045, 3258 en 3274. _Amsterdam, 1 October^ 1867. (23765) GEBROEDERS BOISSÉVAIN in AMSTERDAM zijn verzocht het onderstaande Prospectus te Adverteren en bieden hunne diensten aan. om INSCHRIJVINGEN over te zenden. WILIIMOS AND MANCHESTER RAILWAY UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. £ 200,000 SIK PEE CFNT. STERLING MORTGAGE EONDS. COTTON LOAN BONDS. Issued by Messrs. J. H. Schröder #• CO., and Slamped by the London & County Bank taken in part payment. The undersignod is authorised to offer £ 200,000 of the Mortgage Bonds of the above Railway, hearing Six per Cent. Interest. The Principal and Interest of' these Bonds are payable in London in Sterling, at the office of Messrs. ROBERT BEN SON & C\, and \ each Band will be countersigned by them. The Railway is in full opcration producing ample Revenues over i Expenditure to provide for the Interest and Redemption of these Bonds. The Bonds will be in sums of £ 200 each, and will be issued at the average price of 721/2 per Cent., and payments will be received as follows: 5 per Cent. on Application. 15 per Cent. on Allotment. 35 per Cent. in Cash on November 15th, 1867; or at the , option of the Applicant, 10 per Cent. in Cash and ; 25 per Cent. in Cotton Loan Bonds, ex the Coupons , overdue thereon, issued by Messrs. J. C. SCHRÖDER & C°. and stamped by the LONDON & : COUNTY BANK, which Bonds will be accepted j at the price of 25 por Cent. 17Va per Cent. on the Isth January, 18S8. 72V2 per Cent. , Prospectuses, Forms of application, and all particulars, may be obtained of the underseigned at the London Office of the Company, 10, King's Arms Yard, Moorgate Stroet, E. C.; the LONDON '& COUNTY BANK, E.C.; and at the Office of the Committee of Cotton Loan Bondholders, 32, Nicholas Lane, E.C. HËNBY M. DBANE, (23725) President of the Wilmington fy Manchester Railway.
